member.name: M:AhkCmd.Program.GetWorkingDir(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the current working directory and optionally the user name
member.param: If true the return will be prefixed with "user@", where "user" is the name of the Windows account which launched this program
member.returns: The complete working directory in the form of a string

member.name: M:AhkCmd.Program.GetEndSignal(System.String)
member.summary: Analize a code line to dertimine if it's multiline
member.returns: For multiline commands it returns the end signal, "return" or "}". Otherwise null.
